EnableSilentAutoUpdate.title: Enable Silent Updates
EnableSilentAutoUpdate.description: (EnableSilentAutoUpdate)-Allows the desktop client to silently check for available stable-version updates. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled

AlwaysCheckLatestVersion.title: Always Check for Available Updates on Launch
AlwaysCheckLatestVersion.description: (AlwaysCheckLatestVersion)-Allows the desktop client to check for any available updates. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled

SetUpdatingChannel.title: Update Channel
SetUpdatingChannel.description: (SetUpdatingChannel)-Control the cadence of updates applied to the desktop client (version 5.6.8 or higher)

disableDaemonInstall.title: Disable Auto Update Daemon
disableDaemonInstall.description: (disableDaemonInstall)-Controls the use of the daemon helper to install updates, which bypasses the need to enter admin credentials when upgrading. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled

SetEnrollToken4CloudMDM.title: Zoom Device Management Token
SetEnrollToken4CloudMDM.description: (SetEnrollToken4CloudMDM)-Enroll your device into Zoom Device Management with a token provided from the web portal
